Articles.Content:
It seems like when you are in VAB settings are not applied.

For example i set textures to low, and on launch pad it is ok, when i start to play.

But when i am in VAB, textures are high and other settings, which results in low FPS in VAB.

In-game FPS is ok.

Is it Bug or intended?

Same here... When moving the camera, the low FPS makes it stutters like crazy...

Wish there was a simple fix for us...

Edited April 25, 2016 by jrolson
